title: By the Quene. The Quenes Maiestie callyng to her good remembraunce howe well this realme is furnyshed with good lawes and orders, for redresse of many enormities ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
publisher: In Powles Church yarde by Rycharde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Quenes Maiestie,
notes: Proclamation requiring observation of statutes on apparell and the decay of horses.
